column4: Hi. I', new to linux for the most part. I put Ubuntu on mypc and it crashes every time I start it up. Right now I'm on my little brothers pc which I also put Ubuntu on. His computer works fine. can anyone help me?
how do I start Ubuntu without x
you can boot to a rescue option in grub
that'll boot you straight to a root console.  when you're done there type 'exit' and X and everything will start
